sn22.46:1.5: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.46:1.12: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.46:2.1: Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo na honti.
sn22.46:2.3: Aparantānudiṭṭhīnaṃ asati, thāmaso parāmāso na hoti.
sn22.46:2.8: viññāṇasmiṃ cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.46:2.9: Vimuttattā ṭhitaṃ. Ṭhitattā santusitaṃ. Santusitattā na paritassati. Aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn22.46:2.10: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
